name: WHALES (mrmav)
description:
WHALES is the first game that I completed from beginning to end, in 2016. I had made a lot of prototypes and experiments, but never finished anything.

In this simple game, you play as a God in the sky, feeding some cloud jumping whales.

Controls:

Arrow keys to move and try not to fall;
Space to keep throwing plankton at the whales.

All the code and assets were made by a very naive self.
